title: Скорая помощь
overview: The story of the heroes of the series unfolds at one of the metropolitan ambulance substations, where a new driver has appeared - Konstantin Kulygin. He will alternately carry two teams of doctors. At first, Kostya is in no hurry to share the details of his personal life with anyone. But even while driving, Kulygin manages to point out to his fellow doctors those details that usually go unnoticed, although they often help save the patient's life ...
